SourceInformation.Title: Inventory Of Carbon and Energy Database

Data.Name: Aluminium General, European Mix, Inc Imports
Data.Description: This data has been derived from the world aluminium LCA's. They have produced LCA reports for Europe, North America and worldwide aluminium. Modelled at worldwide average scrap input of 31%, to avoid market distortions. Modelled with 25.6% extrusions, 55.7% rolled and 18.7% castings. Based upon European production and the import of aluminium consumed in Europe. Module D = -3.13 kg CO2e per unit. EOL recovery rate of 95%, based upon DU Telft study of European construction sector. With a 2% material loss yield on the scrap recovered.

Data.Name: Aluminium sheet, European Mix, Inc Imports
Data.Description: This data has been derived from the world aluminium LCA's. They have produced LCA reports for Europe, North America and worldwide aluminium. Modelled at worldwide average scrap input of 31%, to avoid market distortions. Based upon European production and the import of aluminium consumed in Europe. Module D = -3.09 kg CO2e per unit. EOL recovery rate of 95%, based upon DU Telft study of European construction sector. With a 2% material loss yield on the scrap recovered.

Data.Description: This data has been derived from the world aluminium LCA's. They have produced LCA reports for Europe, North America and worldwide aluminium. Data.Name: Aluminium, cast, European Mix, Inc Imports
Data.Description: This data has been derived from the world aluminium LCA's. They have produced LCA reports for Europe, North America and worldwide aluminium. Modelled at worldwide average scrap input of 31%, to avoid market distortions. Based upon European production and the import of aluminium consumed in Europe. Module D = -3.12 kg CO2e per unit. EOL recovery rate of 83%, based upon worldwide global aluminium flow model and for the building and construction sector. With a 2% material loss yield on the scrap recovered.

Data.Name: Aluminium, produced in Europe
Data.Description: This data has been derived from the world aluminium LCA's. They have produced LCA reports for Europe, North America and worldwide aluminium. Modelled at worldwide average scrap input of 31%, to avoid market distortions. This entry doesn’t consider aluminium imported into Europe. The aluminium must be made in Europe. Modelled with 25.6% extrusions, 55.7% rolled and 18.7% castings. Module D = -3.64 kg CO2e per unit. EOL recovery rate of 83%, based upon worldwide global aluminium flow model and for the building and construction sector. With a 2% material loss yield on the scrap recovered.
